patterns: How can I create my profile?

responses: To set up your profile, click on 'Profile' and fill in your SKKU credentials. It's that simple!
Creating your profile is easy! Head to the 'Profile' section and input your SKKU credentials.

patterns: How does the matching algorithm work?
Can you explain how the matching system pairs students?
responses: Our matching algorithm analyzes your profile information to suggest compatible connections between exchange and local students.
The matching system uses your profile details to suggest students with shared interests and backgrounds.

patterns: How do I send friend requests?
Where can I find my friend requests?
Can I manage my friend requests?
responses: You can send friend requests by visiting a user's profile. Any pending requests can be found in your 'Friend Requests' section.
To send a friend request, go to a profile and click 'Send Request.' Check your 'Friend Requests' to manage them.

patterns: How can I start a chat with someone?
Where can I find my chats?
Can I initiate a conversation with a match?
responses: To start a chat, go to a user's profile and click 'Initiate Chat.' Your ongoing conversations are in the 'Chats' section.
You can begin chatting by visiting a profile and selecting 'Start Conversation.' All your chats are in the 'Chats' tab.

patterns: How do I review a friendship?
Where can I submit a review for a connection?
Can I give feedback on a friendship?
responses: After a chat, you'll be prompted to review your friendship. Go to the 'Reviews' section to submit your feedback.
You can review a friendship after chatting. Look for the 'Reviews' tab to share your thoughts.

patterns: What entertainment options does SKKUnite offer?

What activities are available?
responses: SKKUnite offers a podcast, news articles, forums for student queries, and soon, an AI chatbot for engaging discussions!
You can enjoy our podcast, stay updated with news articles, ask questions on the forum, and soon, chat with our AI bot!

patterns: How can I report inappropriate behavior?

Can I report a user?
responses: If you encounter any behavior not aligned with our code of conduct, use the 'Report' feature on the user's profile.
You can report inappropriate behavior by clicking 'Report' on the user's profile. We take this seriously.
